plugins.name: Figma Instance Mode
plugins.description:
Inspired by this post: Please add an "Instance Selection" mode - Share an idea - Figma Community Forum


üî∂ Introducing Figma Instance Mode


- ‚§¥Ô∏è Select Instance

- ‚úÖ Instance Mode On

- üö´ Instance Mode Off


‚§¥Ô∏è Select Instance


check if there is a parent or ancestor instance with your selection, and then will redirect your selection to the instance


It is the same as the official feature named `select instance`, but with this plugin you can blind a hotkey to this feature.


‚úÖ Instance Mode On


Once you run this command, every time when you change your selection in Figma will run the `‚§¥Ô∏è Select Instance` command automatically which means you will always select the instance if your selection is within a instance.


And there will be a inspect window to show the program running result, you can get information with it.


üö´ Instance Mode Off


This feature is to turn off the instance mode, and close the inspect window


üî∂ How to add GLOBAL SHORTCUT in MacOS


Check the tutorial: Custom-shortcuts-in-figma by Jussi Virtanen


MacOS Global Shortcut Path:


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->‚§¥Ô∏è Select Instance


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->‚úÖ Instance Mode On


Plugins->Saved plugins->Figma Instance Mode->üö´ Instance Mode Off

accepted.name: RyanHuang üëÄ
accepted.description:
üî∏ Product Designer
üî∏ Heavy user of Figma
üî∏ Beginner in FE

plugins.name: Design Challenge Generator | For Beginners in Design
plugins.description:
Design Challenge Generator gives you random UI, UX, and Graphics challenges to practice and improve your skills. Perfect for beginners and experienced designers alike! Generate prompts, pick your favorite, and start designing.


How to Use:

  1. Open the plugin
  2. Select a category (UI, UX, or Graphics).
  3. Click "Generate" to get a random challenge.
  4. Keep generating until you find one you like.
  5. Copy it to Figma and start designing!
  6. Share the design with your friends and don't forget to tag me.


Thanksü§ç

plugins.name: JumpMark (Jump Between Marked Figma Components Instantly)
plugins.description:
JumpMark transforms the way you navigate through complex Figma files. This powerful plugin lets you create smart bookmarks for your most-used components, layers, and sections, enabling instant navigation with smooth animations.


üé• Watch Tutorial | üì± Follow Us


Key Features:

  1. Smart Bookmark Groups: Organize your bookmarks into custom groups for different project sections, components, or workflows
  2. One-Click Navigation: Jump between bookmarked locations instantly with beautiful smooth animations
  3. Visual Labeling: Color-code your bookmarks and groups for quick visual recognition
  4. Notes & Documentation: Add helpful notes to bookmarks for team collaboration
  5. Drag & Drop Organization: Easily reorder bookmarks within groups
  6. Search Functionality: Quickly find any bookmark or group using the search feature
  7. Custom Animation Settings: Adjust transition speed and style for comfortable navigation


Perfect For:

  1. UX/UI designers working with large design systems
  2. Design teams collaborating on complex projects
  3. Product designers managing multiple component states
  4. Anyone working with extensive Figma files


How It Works:

  1. Select any elements you want to bookmark
  2. Create a group to organize related bookmarks
  3. Add bookmarks with optional notes and color labels
  4. Navigate instantly between locations with a single click


Free Trial Available:

Try all premium features free for 3 hours. Experience smoother Figma navigation and boost your workflow efficiency.

Transform your Figma navigation experience with JumpMark - the smart bookmarking solution for professional designers.


üéØ Stay Updated

  1. Get early access to new features
  2. Join our newsletter for design tips & updates
  3. Be part of our growing design community


‚ú® Need Help?

Email support

plugins.name: Thumbnail Resizer
plugins.description:
Thumbnail Resizer streamlines the process of creating multiple sized thumbnails from a single design. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Quickly generate thumbnails in various preset sizes for popular platforms
  2. Create custom size presets for your specific needs
  3. Batch resize selected elements with just a few clicks
  4. Save and reuse your frequently used size combinations


Perfect for social media marketers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who needs to create multiple versions of their designs efficiently. Save time and ensure consistency across all your thumbnail sizes with Thumbnail Resizer.

plugins.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
plugins.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.
plugins.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

plugins.name: Frame Manager
plugins.description:
A simple but powerful tool for organizing and fixing frames in Figma. Detect duplicates, fix naming issues, and ensure proper dimensions in your design files.

Full Description

Frame Manager helps you maintain clean and well-organized Figma files by providing essential tools for working with frames.

Key Features:

üîç Duplicate Frame Detection & Removal

Instantly find frames with identical names

Option to automatically remove duplicates while keeping one instance

Clean up messy files by eliminating redundant elements

üè∑Ô∏è Frame Name Standardization

Identify frames with non-standard naming conventions

Automatically fix frame names to follow consistent PascalCase format

Enforce naming consistency across your design system

üìè Size Optimization

Find frames with dimensions not divisible by 2

Fix frame sizes to ensure clean rendering on various displays

Find frames with non-power-of-2 dimensions for texture optimization

How It Works

Install the plugin and run it from the Plugins menu

Select the feature you need from the simple, intuitive interface

Get instant feedback as the plugin detects issues or fixes problems

Enjoy a cleaner, more organized Figma file

Perfect For

Design teams working on large files

Designers preparing assets for developers

Anyone who wants to maintain consistent naming and sizing in their designs

Technical Details

Lightweight and fast - analyzes your file without lag

Non-destructive - always gives you control over changes

Works with any Figma file containing frames

Maintain better design hygiene and save hours of manual cleanup with Frame Manager!


2025 - WildCard Studios - Art Department
plugins.tagline: Clean & organize frames: find duplicates, fix names, proper dimensions with one-click solutions.

plugins.name: flowwwww
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflows with flowwwww, the ultimate plugin for creating dynamic connectors between frames, components, and other objects in Figma. Whether you're designing user flows, wireframes, or complex diagrams, flowwwwwempowers you to create professional, customizable connections with ease.


Key Features

Intuitive Connector Creation

Select two frames or components, and flowwwww will instantly generate a connector between them.


Highly Customizable

Personalize your connectors with adjustable properties:

Stroke color and size.

Add text annotations to label your connectors for enhanced clarity.


Smart Obstacle Avoidance

Enable Obstacle Mode to automatically detect and avoid overlapping objects, ensuring clean and unobstructed connectors.

Perfect for complex designs where connectors need to navigate around other elements.



Use Cases

User Flows : Map out user journeys with clear, annotated connectors between screens.

Wireframing : Create structured layouts with precise connections between components.

Technical Diagrams : Build flowcharts, process maps, and other technical illustrations with ease.

Prototyping : Enhance your prototypes with interactive and visually appealing connectors.


How It Works

Install the flowwwww plugin from the Figma Community.

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the rest‚Äîwatch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector tool‚Äîit‚Äôs a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

We‚Äôre committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Connector Creation for Figma

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the rest‚Äîwatch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector tool‚Äîit‚Äôs a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

We‚Äôre committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description:
C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.


‚ú® How It Works:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.

Example:

[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)

[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)

[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)

2Ô∏è‚É£ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".

3Ô∏è‚É£ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.

Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.


üí° Why Use C2O?

Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.

Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.

Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.

Click ‚ÄúTry it out‚Äù and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! üöÄ

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with üìö icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

plugins.description: Problem : When presenting a solution, explaining the main workflow while showcasing multiple design options for each page can clutter the view. After presenting the main flow, click a toggle button to expand all pages for detailed discussions

plugins.name: Stockpress
plugins.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system‚Äìfor everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
plugins.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready
